mapper.insert: INSERT my_customer(name, address, handler, mobile_telephone, fixed_telephone, id_card, tax_number, verification, application_coding, material_one, material_two, material_three,status, create_time) values(#{name},#{address},#{handler}, #{mobileTelephone},#{fixedTelephone},#{idCard}, #{taxNumber},#{verification},#{applicationCoding}, #{materialOne},#{materialTwo},#{materialThree},#{status},#{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE my_customer set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.name, c.address, c.handler, c.mobile_telephone, c.fixed_telephone, c.id_card, c.tax_number, c.verification, c.application_coding, c.material_one, c.material_two, c.material_three, c.status, c.create_time FROM my_customer c WHERE c.verification = #{verification} order by c.create_time desc
